page.title: 13Leisure in Aston
page.content: {Television is very popular}and there is at least one television set in each home. Popular programmes in 1985 include "Brookside" a soap opera, "Grange Hill" about an imaginary school, "Magnum" an American detective story, and the "News" which informs the country of national and international events. There are several{Youth Clubs}in the area for different age groups.The Tuesday Club for younger children provides organised games inside and out, singing, drama, cookery and outings to places of interest. Youth Clubs for older children have similar organised activities and also provide refreshments, discos and give the children more freedom. { This area is short of leisure {amenities and most of the activities {are organised by people themselves.
